achievement.description: Has successfully completed the requirements for AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional certification
achievement.details: This certification validates advanced technical skills and experience in designing distributed systems on AWS. The candidate demonstrated expertise in designing and deploying dynamically scalable, highly available, fault-tolerant, and reliable applications.

program.name: AWS Solutions Architect Professional Certification
program.description: Advanced certification for solutions architects with 2+ years of hands-on AWS experience

renewal.continuingEducation: Pass current version of exam or higher-level certification

disclaimer: This certification is valid for three years from the date of issue. AWS reserves the right to revoke certification if terms of the AWS Certification Program Agreement are violated.
